title: Authors and Citation
text: Machado W (2024). ggreveal: Reveal ggplot incrementally. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://github.com/weverthonmachado/ggreveal, http://www.weverthon.com/ggreveal/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ggreveal: Reveal a ggplot incrementally},   author = {Weverthon Machado},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://github.com/weverthonmachado/ggreveal},   url = {http://www.weverthon.com/ggreveal/}, }

title: Reveal a ggplot incrementally
text: Create ggplot usually .  use one reveal_by_facet, reveal_by_group reveal_by_layer obtain list plots show elements incrementally.
code: library(palmerpenguins) library(ggplot2)  p <-  ggplot(penguins[!is.na(penguins$sex),],              aes(body_mass_g, bill_length_mm,                  group=sex, color=sex)) +       geom_point() +       geom_smooth(method="lm", formula = 'y ~ x', linewidth=1) +       facet_wrap(~species) +       theme_minimal() p library(ggreveal) reveal_by_group(p) #> [[1]] #>  #> [[2]] #>  #> [[3]]

title: Reveal plot by group — reveal_by_group
text: Creates list plots, showing data incrementally groups.

title: Reveal plot by group — reveal_by_group
text: p ggplot2 object, group aesthetic used. order (optional) numeric vector specifying order reveal groups.

title: Reveal plot by group — reveal_by_group
text: list ggplot2 objects, can passed reveal_save()

title: Reveal plot by group — reveal_by_group
code: # Create full plot library(ggplot2) data("mtcars")  p <- mtcars |>   ggplot(aes(mpg, wt,              color = factor(vs),              group = factor(vs))) +   geom_point() +   geom_smooth(method="lm",               formula = 'y ~ x',               linewidth=1) +   facet_wrap(~am) p   plot_list <- reveal_by_group(p) plot_list[[1]]  plot_list[[2]]  plot_list[[3]]   if (FALSE) { # Save plots reveal_save(plot_list, "myplot", width = 8, height = 4) }

title: Reveal plot by layer — reveal_by_layer
text: Creates list plots, showing data incrementally layers.

title: Reveal plot by layer — reveal_by_layer
text: p ggplot2 object, group aesthetic used. order (optional) numeric vector specifying order reveal layers.

title: Reveal plot by layer — reveal_by_layer
text: list ggplot2 objects, can passed reveal_save()

title: Reveal plot by layer — reveal_by_layer
code: # Create full plot library(ggplot2) data("mtcars")  p <- mtcars |>   ggplot(aes(mpg, wt,              color = factor(vs),              group = factor(vs))) +   geom_point() +   geom_smooth(method="lm",               formula = 'y ~ x',               linewidth=1) +   facet_wrap(~am) p   plot_list <- reveal_by_layer(p) plot_list[[1]]  plot_list[[2]]  plot_list[[3]]   if (FALSE) { # Save plots reveal_save(plot_list, "myplot", width = 8, height = 4) }

title: Reveal plot by facet — reveal_by_panel
text: Creates list plots, showing data incrementally layers.

title: Reveal plot by facet — reveal_by_panel
text: p ggplot2 object, group aesthetic used. order (optional) numeric vector specifying order reveal panels. (optional) one "data" "everything".' "data", basic graph layout (including axes facet labels) shown start, data points shown incrementally. "everything", entire panels shown incrementally.

title: Reveal plot by facet — reveal_by_panel
text: list ggplot2 objects, can passed reveal_save()

title: Reveal plot by facet — reveal_by_panel
code: # Create full plot library(ggplot2) data("mtcars")  p <- mtcars |>   ggplot(aes(mpg, wt,              color = factor(vs),              group = factor(vs))) +   geom_point() +   geom_smooth(method="lm",               formula = 'y ~ x',               linewidth=1) +   facet_wrap(~am) p   # Only data plot_list <- reveal_by_panel(p, what = "data") plot_list[[1]]  plot_list[[2]]  plot_list[[3]]   # Everything plot_list <- reveal_by_panel(p, what = "everything") plot_list[[1]]  plot_list[[2]]  plot_list[[3]]   if (FALSE) { # Save plots reveal_save(plot_list, "myplot", width = 8, height = 4) }

title: Saves incremental plots — reveal_save
text: plot_list list plots created reveal_by_group(), reveal_by_layer() reveal_by_panel() basename base file name used saving ... Additional arguments (e.g. width, height) passed ggplot2::ggsave()

title: Saves incremental plots — reveal_save
code: # Create full plot library(ggplot2) data("mtcars")  p <- mtcars |>   ggplot(aes(mpg, wt,              color = factor(vs),              group = factor(vs))) +   geom_point() +   geom_smooth(method="lm",               formula = 'y ~ x',               linewidth=1) +   facet_wrap(~am) p   plot_list <- reveal_by_group(p) plot_list[[1]]  plot_list[[2]]  plot_list[[3]]   if (FALSE) { # Save plots reveal_save(plot_list, "myplot", width = 8, height = 4) }
